com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh

Class DeviceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silabs.bluetooth_mesh.DeviceInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DeviceInfo>

    public class DeviceInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DeviceInfo>
    DeviceInfo is the class that defines and holds the devices/nodes information. Each device after provision must have a DeviceInfo, and the operations as request the device composition data (DCD), configure models, and controls will be done in this object

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DeviceInfo.Configuration
      Class which contains all the configuration data from the Device
      class  DeviceInfo.DCD
      Subclass of DeviceInfo that store and parses the device composition data
      class  DeviceInfo.Element
      Class that defines the Element Structure of a Bluetooth Mesh Device This information is inside de device composition data (DCD) and it is generated by the setDCD

    • Method Detail

      • security

        public java.lang.String security()
        Return String with the Security Value, this string is HIGH when the OOB authentication byte array has more than 6 elements
        Returns:
        String high or low

      • setSecurity

        public void setSecurity(int security)
        Set Security Value, the user application must set this value to 1 if the OOB authentication byte array has more than 6 elements
        Parameters:
        security - Integer (0) for low and (1) for high
